column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ owiee dɛ ɔkasa kyerɛ Saul no
column3: Jonatan ne kra takyeer David ne kra ho
column4: na Jonatan dɔɔ no dɛ noara ne kra."

column2: "Na da no ara na Saul faa no
column3: na ɔamma ɔannkɔ fie wɔ n'egya fie bio."

column2: "Nna Jonatan na David dzii ahyɛmu
column3: osiandɛ ɔdɔɔ no dɛ noara ne kra."

column2: "Na Jonatan worɔɔw ne bataker a ɔhyɛ no no
column3: na ɔdze maa David

column2: "Na David fiir edzi kɔr beebiara mbrɛ Saul somaa no no
column3: na ɔbɔɔ ne bra nyansa mu na osii no yie: na Saul dze no hyɛɛ panyin wɔ akofo no hɔn do
column4: na ɔsɔɔ ɔman no nyinara enyi
column5: na Saul no nkowaa no so enyi."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: David kokum Filistianyi no na ɔsanee reba no
column4: nna mbaa no fii Israel nkurow nyinara mu puepuei

column2: "Na mbaa no toow ndwom kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔnho wɔ hɔn agor no mu
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column5: Na David eku ne mpedu mpedu."

column2: "Na asɛm no annyɛ Saul dɛw
column3: na no bo fuuw dodoodow; na ɔsee dɛ
column5: na emi dze apem apem na wɔdze ama me: na ebɛnadze bio na aka dɛ onya dɛ gyama ahenman yi ara?"

column2: "Na ofitsi da no ara ɔdze kɔ no
column3: Saul n'enyi saa David."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ n'adzekyee no
column3: sunsum bɔn a ofi Nyankopɔn hɔ baa Saul do dzendzenndzen
column4: na ɔkɔɔm wɔ ofi no mu: na David dze ne nsa bɔɔ sanku
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛ no daa no: nna Saul ne peaa dze ne nsamu."

column2: "Na Saul toow peaa no; na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mobɔbɔ David ma oekitsa ban. Na David twee noho fii n'enyim mprɛnu."

column2: "Na Saul suroo David
column3: osiandɛ EWURADZE dzi n'ekyir

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Saul yii no wɔ ne nkyɛn
column3: na ɔyɛɛ no ne safohen wɔ apem do: na odzii ɔman no enyim wɔ ɔsa mu."

column2: "Na osii David yie wɔ n'akwan nyinara mu; na EWURADZE so dzii n'ekyir."
"Na aber a Saul hun dɛ osii no yie dodoodow no
column3: ɔbɔɔ no ho hu."

column2: "Na Israel na Juda nyinara dɔɔ David
column3: osiandɛ ɔno na ɔnye hɔn kɔ sa na ɔnye hɔn ɔba."

column2: "Na Saul see David dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: me babaa panyin Merab nye yi
column5: ɔno na medze no mebɛma wo ayewar: na ɔwo dze
column6: ndam ara na yɛ fa ma me
column7: na ko EWURADZE no ko (Osiandɛ Saul dwenee wɔ no mu dɛ
column8: Mma me nsa nnda no do
column9: mbom wɔmma Filistiafo nsa nda no do)."

column2: "Na David see Saul dɛ
column3: Emi nye woana
column5: anaa m'egya ebusua nye ebɛnadze wɔ Israel

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a nkyɛ wɔdze Saul ne babaa Merab bɛma David no
column3: nna wɔdze no maa Meholatnyi Adriel ayewar."

column2: "Na Saul ne babaa Mikal dɔɔ David: na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Saul
column3: na asɛm no sɔɔ n'enyi."

column2: "Na Saul see dɛ
column3: Medze no mebɛma
column5: na ama Filistiafo hɔn nsa aada no do. Dɛm ntsi Saul see David ne mpɛn ebien no dɛ

column2: "Na Saul hyɛɛ no nkowaa dɛ
column3: Wɔnye David ntu egyina nsumaa mu nse dɛ
column6: na no nkowaa nyinara wɔdɔ wo: dɛm ntsi afei yɛ ɔhen n'asew."

column2: "Na Saul no nkowaa no kaa nsɛm no wɔ David n'asomu. Na David see dɛ
column3: Ana ɔyɛ hom enyi do adze ba dɛ ebɛyɛ ɔhen n'asew

column2: "Na Saul no nkowaa no kɛkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ David kae nye yi."

column2: "Na Saul see dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ hom nkɛse David nye yi
column5: na ɔrohwehwɛ Filistiafo hɔn mbarimba anower ɔha
column6: ama oeedzi ɔhen n'atamfo do wer. Afei Saul dwen dɛ ɔreyɛ ma David akɔtɔ wɔ Filistiafo hɔn nsamu."

column2: "Na no nkowaa no kɛkaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ David no
column3: ɔyɛɛ David dɛw papaara dɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔhen n'asew. Na nda no enndu;"

column2: "na David soɛree sii mu
column3: ɔno na ne mbarimba no
column4: na wokokum Filistiafo hɔn mu mbarimba ahaenu
column5: na David dze hɔn mbarimba anower bae
column6: ma wɔkanee ma odur ano dze maa ɔhen no
column8: na Saul dze ne ba Mikal maa no awar."

column2: "Na Saul hwɛe hun dɛ EWURADZE dzi David n'ekyir; na Saul ne babaa Mikal dɔɔ no."
"Na Saul daa ho ara suroo David dodow; na ɔyɛɛ David ne tamfo ara daa."
"Na Filistiafo asafohemfo no kɔr do araa tuu hɔn do sa: naaso ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber biara sɛ wotu a
column4: David da noho edzi nyansa mu ma osi no yie kyɛn Saul no nkowaa nyinara; ma dɛm ntsi wɔbɔɔ ne dzin enyidzi mu papaara."
